text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse LIAR @POTUS BRAGS how well U.S. is doing! NOTHING to brag about! When he says “other countries call to ask what we are doing?” What they are REALLY asking is “What the fu@k ARE you doing! Then Trump precedes to beg for help...hence KOREA!  https://t.co/iv0KBOD5IB
